0101011100111101 1010110101101011 1 -> sum: 0000010010101001, cout: 1
0010010011010010 0001110100100111 1 -> sum: 0100000111111010, cout: 0

0110110100110001 1101110001010111 0 -> sum: 0100100110001000, cout: 1

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
